name: Hook is the Hook
description:
Hook is the Hook is an arena sandbox game where you use your grappling hook in order to kill enemies in unique and stylish ways, to impress the audience.

Your grappling hook can move you around, move enemies, objects and even trigger traps.

The game features a number of different traps and systems you can use against your foes. From fire to lion traps, there's a large range of possible tactics for you to be victorious.

A game created by:

Daniel Buckley

Game design, programming, UI designer.

Nam Ha

Game design, animator, level designer.
